name: FetchDeviceConfig
description: Retrieve a Config for a Device.

DeviceSid.description: A 34-character string that uniquely identifies the Device.

Key.description: The config key; up to 100 characters.

$ul: **device_sid**: A 34-character string that uniquely identifies the parent Device.
**key**: The config key; up to 100 characters.
**url**: The absolute URL of the Config.
**value**: The config value; up to 4096 characters.
